text: Raheja is an Indian surname. Notable people with the surname include: *Chandru Raheja (born 1941), Indian billionaire businessman *Dinesh Raheja (born 1957), Indian author, columnist, TV scriptwriter, film historian *Gloria Goodwin Raheja, American anthropologist *Mishal Raheja, Indian television actor *Rajan Raheja (born c. 1954), Indian billionaire businessman *Tushar Raheja (born 1984), Indian storyteller and researcher Category:Surnames
title: Raheja
